channel.title: Stand Up on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Stand Up on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Hiding Behind a Keyboard: The Terror of the Unknown
item.description: I used to be terrified of any sort of public speaking. This terror was justified by my complete inability to speak to any group larger than 2 – 3. Before my first semester at Purdue, during orientation, we were always asked to introduce ourselves with our “Name, Hometown, Major” — something I couldn’t do without fumbling over my words and screwing something up.
